    Hahn (1984)

    hahn_1984.Rd

    Allometric models from Hahn (1984)

    Stem Height Models

    hst = 4.5 + b_1 * (1 - exp(b_2 * dsob))^b_3 * hstix^b_4 * T^b_5 * gn^b_6

    • hst [ft] - total height of the stem

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hstix [ft] - variable not defined

    • d [in] - Top d.o.b., a value of 0 gives total height.

    • gn [ft2 acre-1] - stand-level basal area

    Model Parameters

    Stem Volume Models

    vsa = b_0 + b_1 * dsob^2 * hst

    • vsa [ft3] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hst [ft] - total height of the stem

    Model Parameters

    vsa = b_0 + b_1 * dsob^2 * hst

    • vsa [board_foot] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hst [ft] - total height of the stem

    Stump Volume Models

    vu = s * dsob^2

    • vu [ft3] - volume of the stump

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

    Stem Ratio Models

    rsk = (b_0 + b_1 * dsob)/100

    • rsk [] - bark correction factor

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters
